channel.title: Adobe Flash Quizzes (how to hack)
channel.description:
A guy from my website shot me this question.
His school runs quizzes in flash. I was wondering if it's possible to break the file down and be able to view the answers?
Is there such a technique to do this? I would figure the answers would be encrypted though.

item.title: Adobe Flash Quizzes (how to hack)
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

So it only serves a a client. Cheers

Read full topic

item.title: Adobe Flash Quizzes (how to hack)
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Yeah you can decompile the SWF with numerous utilities. It is unlikely the answers would be in there at all, but you never know what kind of incompetent retards code these things.

Read full topic
